title: 'Sick date-rape joke is proof Home Secretary James Cleverly has to go'
description: The Sunday Mirror says James Cleverly should know better after it was revealed the Home Secretary made a 'joke' about giving Rohypnol to his wife

title: Boost for Rishi Sunak as 'Santa rally' increases hopes of tax cuts in Spring Budget providing dose of optimism for struggling families
description: Rising share values are a signal of optimism on markets and will bring a dose of Christmas cheer to millions of British savers - including those with pension plans - and business leaders.

title: Rishi Sunak Accused Of 'Weakness' By Tory MPs Over Immigration Climbdown
description: Rishi Sunak has been accused of “weakness” as he faced an angry Tory backlash over his latest climbdown. The prime minister confirmed that visa changes designed to reduce immigration have been delayed by a year until 2025.

title: NHS England boss ‘fearful’ for patients during junior doctor strikes
description: Prime Minister Rishi Sunak branded the action “disappointing” and urged junior doctors to call off strikes. The next strike will begin at 7am on January 3 and end at 7am on January 9. It will be the longest strike in the 75-year history of the NHS.

title: Sneaky Sir Keir Starmer cannot be allowed to pull the wool over the eyes of voters

title: Cameron warns of ‘destructive’ potential of small boats issue
description: Lord Cameron said tackling the problem was important to protect the UK’s immigration system and people’s trust in politics.

title: Warring Conservatives must unite and cut taxes if they want to have a shot at winning general election, poll suggests

title: Government's legal bill to defend stalling Rwanda migrant scheme tops £2million
description: Not a single migrant has been sent to east African nation under a controversial Tory scheme, but the Government's legal bill for defending it against court challenges has ballooned

title: Sunak delayed migration crackdown amid fears OBR would slash tax-cutting headroom
description: PM was considering announcing measures restricting arrival of foreign workers in the autumn, but waited until December

title: Rishi Sunak defends visa clampdown delay after Tory criticism
description: The Prime Minister restated his intention to implement stricter UK visa rules for overseas family members, despite facing criticism from within the Tory party.

title: Tory donor who paid for Rishi Sunak’s private jet faces legal challenge over business dealings
description: Entrepreneur Akhil Tripathi, who made his fortune inventing an anti-snoring device, has donated more than £150,000 to the Conservative Party since 2021

title: James Dyson praises Liz Truss in stinging swipe at Rishi Sunak as UK on brink of recession
description: Recent stats show the UK economy shrank in the last quarter, painting a damning image of Mr Sunak's current economic strategy.

title: Rail is on track for managed decline, with fare rises only part of the problem
description: On the east coast mainline, which connects London King’s Cross with Yorkshire, northeast England and Scotland, LNER cancelled and curtailed a number of trains on Saturday, again because of crew shortages. This was particularly significant because King’s Cross station is closed on Christmas Eve due to engineering work.

title: James Dyson accuses Rishi Sunak of not ‘going for growth’ as UK at risk of recession
description: Sir James Dyson has lashed out at Rishi Sunak and Jeremy Hunt, accusing the government of not “ going for growth ”. The billionaire inventor said wealth generation and growth have become “dirty words” under the prime minister and chancellor’s leadership.

title: James Dyson criticises Tories for not ‘going for growth’ after fall in GDP
